short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to play around with minecraft books

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you easily check how your translations will look on in-game books by enabling you to preview them in real time. If you are using Crowdin, you can directly import the current string.
